text: even quicker and dirtier if you've got HubSpot tracking on, in settings > Marketing Forms - Non HubSpot forms, you can make it just collect data from any html form on the page and logs it based on the ID (creates a HubSpot form with the fields and trys to map them up to existing properties)

How would I go about getting a Module with a choice selector to show the selected value in the Email UI for users to select an item from the list on the module, for use within the email itself? i.e. Selecting a brand name from a bunch of brands, to fill in "variables" left in the template. Any help appreciated. I've managed to do this with using Choices directly on the template, but Ideally want it managed in a module inside of the UI to manage a list instead of hard coded.
